meanings.definition: A unit of distance equal to 1,000 parsecs.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use kiloparsecs to measure faraway stars.
meanings.sent2: The galaxy is located millions of kiloparsecs away.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could travel a kiloparsec in a spaceship!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as distant as a kiloparsec.
meanings.sent5: The concept of kiloparsecs can be mind-boggling for some.

meanings.definition: Used to measure astronomical distances on a large scale.
meanings.sent1: Astronomers rely on kiloparsecs for vast measurements.
meanings.sent2: The telescope can detect objects thousands of kiloparsecs away.
meanings.sent3: The alien said, 'I come in peace from a kiloparsec away!'
meanings.sent4: The idea of time travel seemed closer than a kiloparsec.
meanings.sent5: The enormity of the universe is best understood in kiloparsecs.
